text: Ivo Karlović (born February 29, 1979) is a Croatian professional tennis player. Ivo became pro in 2000. He was born in Zagreb, Croatia. Ivo play tennis right hand, one hand backhand. ==Sources== * ATP Profile ==Other websites== * Karlovic`s official website * ATP Profile Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb
title: Ivo Karlović
